# publish-test-results

## permissions

[Permissions](https://github.com/EnricoMi/publish-unit-test-result-action?tab=readme-ov-file#permissions)

### Public GitHub Repositories

```yaml
permissions:
  checks: write
  pull-requests: write
```

### Private GitHub Repositories

```yaml
permissions:
  contents: read
  issues: read
  checks: write
  pull-requests: write
```
